alert.note: Alert for Churchill (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 16 at 12:54PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR A DAM FLOODGATE RELEASE REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Hydrologic flooding caused by upstream dam release continues. * WHERE...A portion of west central Nevada, including the following county, Churchill. * WHEN...Until 100 PM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding and high flows along the Carson River. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1253 PM PDT, Flooding will result in the advisory area from water release at Lahontan Dam. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Fallon, including Bafford Lane and other low lying areas along the lower Carson River. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
